thread.title: Ukraine will be between the anticyclone Ernst and the recent cyclone Didenko said when strong frosts will hit
thread.title_full: Ukraine will be between the anticyclone Ernst and the recent cyclone Didenko said when strong frosts will hit

author: Svyatenko Tamara
title: Ukraine will be between the anticyclone Ernst and the recent cyclone Didenko said when strong frosts will hit
text:
Ukraine will be between the anticyclone Ernst and the recent cyclone: Didenko said when strong frosts will hit.
Weather on Friday, December 13
Forecaster Natalia Didenko reported that dry weather with sunny clearings is expected in Ukraine on Friday, December 13. However, light snow is possible at night in the north and during the day in the east. Ukraine will be between the anticyclone and the recent cyclone, so gusty winds are expected.
Cold weather continues, with temperatures at night ranging from -2 to -7 and during the day from -1 to -6 degrees. Be cautious on the roads due to ice, choose sturdy and non-slip shoes, and do not move too quickly.
Weather in Kyiv
In Kyiv, no precipitation is expected on Friday, but with strong northwestern winds and frost. The temperature will range from -3 to -6 degrees. It is recommended to dress in layers and warmly. Warming will begin on Sunday.
Recall that an atmospheric front will cover Ukraine.
